content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

Here is one possible implementation of the `extract_julia_code` function:

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    julia_code_blocks = parse_markdown(md)

    code_blocks = map(julia_code_blocks), each_string.julia_code)

    joined_code_blocks = join(code_blocks, "\n"))

    return joined_code_blocks
end
```

This implementation uses the `parse_markdown` function from the Julia Markdown package to parse the markdown text and extract all the julia language code blocks.
